materials.raw_text:
- Cesium Sulfide (Cs2S): 80 grams 
 - Manganese (II) Phosphate (Mn3(PO4)2): 60 grams 
 - Ammonium Phosphate (NH4)3PO4: 40 grams 
 - Sulfur (S): 32 grams

sourcing.instructions:
- Cesium Sulfide: Available from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in fine chemicals. 
 - Manganese (II) Phosphate: Obtain from chemical suppliers or specialized mineral suppliers. 
 - Ammonium Phosphate: Available at agricultural supply stores or chemical suppliers. 
 - Sulfur: Obtain from chemical supply stores or garden centers.
